Content: ->┏╋━━━◥◣◆◢◤━━╋┓---------------- Team Relentless | Worldwide ┗╋━━◥◣◆◢◤━━━╋┛<- ➤ We are a "Gaming clan". Playing Worldwide on Console_ and PC. ➤VFX-GFX Editors We are looking Experienced VFX and GFX editors to make montages_ cinematic edits and logos for the team. You must also be able to work for free_ and must provide what we ask for. If you are interested make sure to message me. You can also make a clip montage for us NL━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━NL➤Competitive Team RequirementsNL1. Must be 13+NL2. 2KDNL3. 175+ wins NL4. 3_500 matches playedNL5. 1 month scrim experienceNL━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━NL➤Recruiters We are looking for people who are able to tryout people and know the procedures on how to conduct tryouts. You also must be active with what you do and welcome new members_ and make sure they reach the clan requirements of the team. ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ ➤Content Creators - Join The Team! :) We are looking for people who have 100+ subscribers/followers on media such as Youtube and Twitch to advertise Relentless or to spread the word of the clan! If you have a specific amount of people that follow/subscribe to you_ you will get the YT rank but you are particularly associated with us but not fully you must get tried out the you can. ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ Other Requirements: ➤Must be active (Discord & in game) ➤Ability to use in game VC AND Discord VC ➤MUST BE LOYAL! ➤Must be able to add RE to your IGN ➤Must be willing to take constructive criticism! ➤NO MULTICLANNING! Also message the Leader your epic name. Make sure to publisize the clan_ and you MUST add Relentless to your name. Also you must provide clips to us whenever you can ┏╋━━━━━◥◣◆◢◤━━━━━╋┓ Thanks! - Leader Of Relentless ┗╋━━━━━◥◣◆◢◤━━━━━╋┛ DM me if you want the link to the discord
